field.name: show_searchphrase
field.label: Word Combination
field.description: Allow users to select method of combining the search words, e.g. any, all, exact phrase

field.name: default_searchphrase
field.label: Default combination
field.description: Default (preselected) method of combining the search words

field.name: minchars
field.label: Word Min Length
field.description: Minimum character length that search words are allowed to have

field.name: maxchars
field.label: Word Max Length
field.description: Maximum characters length that search words are allowed to have

field.name: limit_override
field.label: Limit Selector
field.description: Display frontend selection to allow to override default setting

field.name: orderby_override
field.label: Ordering Selector
field.description: Display frontend selection to allow to override default setting

field.name: autodisplayadvoptions
field.label: Advanced Search Box
field.description: If this is disabled. Then a clickable text will appear to allow user to toggle the advanced search box on/off.

field.name: show_filtersop
field.label: Filters Combination
field.description: Allow users to select method of combining the search filters, e.g. any filter, all filters

field.name: default_filtersop
field.label: Default combination
field.description: Default (preselected) method of combining the search filters

field.name: advsearch_fieldlist
field.label: Add Filter (below)
field.description: Please select one by one fields to add to textarea below.

field.name: search_fields
field.label: Attribute Filters
field.description: Enter Content Attibute Filters used to limit the text search result list, these will be included in the search form, and will appear inside advanced search options box. You can separate each field by comma(,).
Optional selection parameters like content types and Other Search Areas of Site (non FC Content Data)

field.name: cantypes
field.label: Show selection
field.description: Allow users to select content types they want to include in their search

field.name: contenttypes
field.label: Searchable Types
field.description: The content types the search will include. NOTE: if user is allowed to select Content Types, then the selection list will be LIMITED to display ONLY the types selected here

field.name: show_searchareas
field.label: Show selection
field.description: Allow the user to select and search other areas of the website content, e.g. like weblinks, user contacts, etc

field.name: searchareas
field.label: Search Areas
field.description: The site's (non-FC content) search areas, that the search will include. NOTE: if user is allowed to select Search Areas, then the selection list will be LIMITED to display ONLY the search areas selected here

field.name: show_searchordering
field.label: Show ordering
field.description: Allow frontend users to select ordering of results of other areas of the website content. NOTE this is different ordering from the ordering used for main content results.

field.name: default_searchordering
field.label: Default value
field.description: Default ordering for sorting the results of the search

field.name: show_text
field.label: Show matching information
field.description: Display for each result its matching information, showing what words or filters were matched during search

field.name: show_date
field.label: Show creation date
field.description: Display for each result its creation date
